titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2014 the tax rule exempting dividends, interest, rents, and royalties received or accrued from certain controlled foreign corporations by a related entity from treatment as foreign holding company income (thus permitting tax deferral of such income).
